  • Method Details

    • greedySupplier

      public Solution greedySupplier​(Problem problem)
      Optional Task #4 - create a simple algorithm that provides a feasible solution. The algorithm is Greedy from the supplier's point of view. We iterate through the cost matrix and for every supplier we determine the minimum existing cost. We send as many units as possible at that lowest cost to the destination in cause. We subtract the units sent from both the supply and demand. We repeat this until the supply is 0, case in which we go to the next supplier.
      Parameters:
      problem - the problem to be solved.
      Returns:
      the solution of the Transportation Cost Problem instance given, using a Greedy approach
